parameter.name: url
parameter.documentation: Optionally provides one ore more relative search parameter URLs (e.g. "Patient?active=true" or "Observation?") that will be reindexed. Note that the URL applies to the resources as they are currently indexed, so you should not use a search parameter that needs reindexing in the URL or some resources may be missed. If no URLs are provided, all resources of all types will be reindexed.

parameter.name: reindexSearchParameters
parameter.documentation: Should search parameters be reindexed (default: ALL)

parameter.name: optimizeStorage
parameter.documentation: Should we attempt to optimize storage for resources (default: NONE)

parameter.name: optimisticLock
parameter.documentation: Should we attempt to optimistically lock resources being reindexed in order to avoid concurrency issues (default: true)
